mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_scrap (uid, bno) VALUES (#{uid}, #{bno}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE uid=#{uid}, bno=#{bno}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(ts.scno) AS cnt FROM tbl_scrap ts INNER JOIN tbl_board tb ON ts.bno=tb.bno WHERE ts.uid=#{uid}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tbl_scrap WHERE uid=#{uid} AND scno=#{scno}
